maqras.text: 87|1|apane sarvochch prabhu ke naam kee pavitrata ka smaran karo.
87|2|jisane paida kiya aur theek-theek banaaya.
87|3|aur jisane anumaan lagaakar nirdhaarit kiya, phir seedhee raah dikhaayee.
87|4|aur jisane chaara upajaaya.
87|5|phir use (sukha kar) kooda bana diya.
87|6|(he nabee!) ham tumhen aisa padhaayenge ki bhoologe nahin.
87|7|parantu, jise allaah chaahe. nishchay hee vah sabhee khulee tatha chhipee baaton ko jaanata hai.
87|8|aur ham tumhen saral maarg ka saahas denge.
87|9|to aap dharm kee shiksha dete rahen. agar shiksha laabhadaayak ho.
87|10|darane vaala hee shiksha grahan karega.
87|11|aur durbhaagy usase door rahega.
87|12|jo bheeshan agni mein jaayega.
87|13|phir usamen na marega, na jeevit rahega.
87|14|vah saphal ho gaya, jisane apana shudhdikaran kiya.
87|15|tatha apane paalanahaar ke naam ka smaran kiya aur namaaz padhee.
87|16|balki tum log to saansaarik jeevan ko praathamikata dete ho.
87|17|jabaki aakhirat ka jeevan hee uttm aur sthaayee hai.
87|18|yahee baat, pratham granthon mein hai.
87|19|(arthaat) ibraaheem tatha moosa ke granthon mein.
88|1|kya tere paas pooree srshtee par chha jaane vaalee (kyaamat) ka samaachaar aaya
88|2|us din kitane moonh sahame honge.
88|3|parishram karate thake ja rahe honge.
88|4|par ve dahakatee aag mein jaayenge.
88|5|unhen kholate sote ka jal pilaaya jaayega.
88|6|unake lie kateelee jhaad ke siva, koee bhojan saamagree nahin hogee.
88|7|jo na mota karegee aur na bhookh door karegee.
88|8|kitane mukh us din nirmal honge.
88|9|apane prayaas se prasann honge.
88|10|oonche svarg mein honge.
88|11|usamen koee bakavaas nahin sunenge.
88|12|usamen bahata jal srot hoga.
88|13|aur usamen oonche-oonche sinhaasan honge.
88|14|usamen bahut saare pyaale rakhe honge.
88|15|panktiyon mein galeeche lage honge.
88|16|aur makhmalee qaaleenen bichhee hongee.
88|17|kya vah oonton ko nahin dekhate ki kaise paida kiye gaye hain
88|18|aur aakaash ko ki kis prakaar ooncha kiya gaya
88|19|aur parvaton ko ki kaise gaade gaye
88|20|tatha dharatee ko ki kaise pasaaree gayee
88|21|atah aap shiksha (naseehta) den ki aap shiksha dene vaale hain.
88|22|aap unapar adhikaaree nahin hain.
88|23|parantu, jo munh pherega aur nahin maanega
88|24|to allaah use bhaaree yaatana dega.
88|25|unhen hamaaree or hee vaapas aana hai.
88|26|phir hamen hee unaka haisaab lena hai.
89|1|shapath hai bhor kee
89|2|tatha das raatriyon kee
89|3|aur jode tatha akele kee
89|4|aur raatri kee jab jaane lage
89|5|kya usamen kisee matimaan (samajhadaar) ke lie koee shapath hai
89|6|kya tumane nahin dekha ki tumhaare paalanahaar ne "aad" ke saat kya kiya
89|7|stambhon vaale "iram" ke saath
89|8|jinake samaan deshon mein log nahin paida kiye gaye.
89|9|tatha "samood" ke saath jinhonne ghaatiyon me chattaanon ko kaat rakha tha.
89|10|aur mekhon vaale firaun ke saath.
89|11|jinhonne nagaron mein upadrav kar rakha tha.
89|12|aur nagaron mein bada upadrav phaila rakha tha.
89|13|phir tere paalanahaar ne unapar dand ka koda barasa diya.
89|14|vaastav mein, tera paalanahaar ghaat mein hai.
89|15|parantu, jab insaan kee usaka paalanahaar pareeksha leta hai aur use sammaan aur dhan deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paalanahaar ne mera sammaan kiya.
89|16|parantu, jab usakee pareeksha lene ke lie usakee jeevika sankeern (kam) kar deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paalanahaar ne mera apamaan kiya.
89|17|aisa nahin, balki tum anaath ka aadar nahin karate.
89|18|tatha gareeb ko khaana khilaane ke lie ek-doosare ko nahin ubhaarate.
89|19|aur meeraas (mrtak sampatti) ke dhan ko samet-samet kar kha jaate ho.
89|20|aur dhan se bada moh rakhate ho.
89|21|saavadhaan! jab dharatee khand-khand kar dee jaayegee.
89|22|aur tera paalanahaar svayan padaarvan karega aur farishte panktiyon mein honge.
89|23|aur us din narak laayee jaayegee, us din insaan saavadhaan ho jaayega, kintu saavadhaanee laabh-daayak na hogee.
89|24|vah kaamana karega ke kaash! apane sada ki jeevan ke lie karm kiye hote.
89|25|us din (allaah) ke dand ke samaan koee dand nahin hoga.
89|26|aur na usake jaisee jakad koee jakadega.
89|27|he shaant aatma
89|28|apane paalanahaar kee or chal, too usase prasann, aur vah tujh se prasann.
89|29|too mere bhakton mein pravesh kar ja.
89|30|aur mere svarg mein pravesh kar ja.
